Package index

Themes

Apply Insper’s visual identity to ggplot2 plots

theme_insper()
Insper Custom ggplot2 Theme
theme_insper_minimal()
Insper Minimal Theme (Experimental)
theme_insper_presentation()
Insper Presentation Theme (Experimental)
theme_insper_print()
Insper Print Theme (Experimental)
import_insper_fonts()
Import Insper Fonts from Google Fonts
setup_insper_fonts()
Interactive Setup Wizard for Insper Fonts and Graphics
check_insper_fonts()
Check Insper Font Availability
use_ragg_device()
Configure ragg Graphics Device

Colors and Palettes

Access Insper brand colors and palettes

show_insper_colors()
Visualize All Individual Insper Colors
show_insper_palette()
Visualize Insper Color Palettes
list_palettes()
List Available Insper Color Palettes
get_insper_colors()
Extract Individual Insper Colors
get_palette_colors()
Extract Hex Codes from Insper Color Palettes

ggplot2 Scales

Insper color scales for ggplot2

scale_color_insper_c() scale_colour_insper_c() scale_fill_insper_c()
Insper Continuous Color Scale for ggplot2
scale_color_insper_d() scale_colour_insper_d() scale_fill_insper_d()
Insper Discrete Color Scale for ggplot2

Plot Functions

Pre-configured plotting functions with Insper theme

insper_barplot()
Create a Bar Plot with Insper Styling
insper_scatterplot()
Insper Scatter Plot
insper_timeseries()
Insper Time Series Plot
insper_area()
Insper Area Plot
insper_boxplot()
Insper Box Plot
insper_violin()
Insper Violin Plot
insper_heatmap()
Insper Heatmap
insper_histogram()
Insper Histogram
insper_density()
Insper Density Plot

Utilities

Helper functions for formatting and saving plots

save_insper_plot()
Save Insper Plot
format_num_br()
Format Brazilian Numbers

Data

Internal package data

fossil_fuel
Global Fossil Fuel Consumption
macro_series
Brazilian Macroeconomic Time Series
macro_series_long
Brazilian Macroeconomic Time Series (Long Format)
rec_buslines
Recife Bus Lines Data
rec_passengers
Recife Bus Passengers Data
spo_metro
São Paulo Metro Line 4 Station Data
